function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in population leading to higher human-human contact and human-environment contact","Impact":"Compounding health problems and increased demand for healthcare services","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce human-human and human-environment contact, improving healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, contact tracing technology","People":"Population in resource-constrained malarious regions","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Anthropogenic activities contributing to deforestation and workplace illnesses","Impact":"Increased demand for construction, deforestation, workplace illnesses, and financial pressures on public health services","Mitigation":"Regulating anthropogenic activities, promoting sustainable construction practices, implementing workplace safety measures","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology, sustainable construction technology","People":"Workers in construction, public health services","Owner":"Government, construction companies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Social determinants of health influencing malaria prevalence","Impact":"Impact on food security, cultural practices, spiritual beliefs, and healthcare access","Mitigation":"Improving food security, addressing cultural and spiritual barriers to healthcare, promoting urban planning policies that support public health","Technologies":"Food security technology, healthcare access technology","People":"Vulnerable groups, children in patriarchal families","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, urban planners"}]}
